"Defeat any $(0) you find!

"Attention, all active ARKS members!
Quickly join forces and work
to eliminate enemy forces in the area!"

"/face2 Great work!
You worked well together!"

"/face4 Unfortunate, but it can't be helped.
We'll pick up the wounded."

"Your coordination is suffering.
Remember that you must
work together."

"That ARKS can't handle this alone.
I recommend you retreat
should you fail again."
"$(0) is under too much strain. The next time they are incapacitated, we will forcibly withdraw them."

"The support partner belonging to
$(0) is being attacked
by hostiles! Please assist!"
"Eliminate the hostiles in the area and ensure the support partner's safety."
"It's unfortunate, but we had no choice. $(0) was extracted and has been returned to the ship."

"交戦中のアークスの反応を付近に捕捉。
合流し、協力して、周囲の敵性存在を
撃退してください。"

"敵性勢力の全滅を確認。
協力での任務遂行、見事です。"

"任務失敗を確認。
対象のアークスを回収します。"

"協力が不十分かと。
互いの存在を意識して
任務にあたってください。"

"対象のアークスの負担が大きく
危険な状態です。次の失敗時には

"$(0)の負荷
限界域。次の戦闘不能時に
強制回収を実行します。"
"$(0)'s Support Partner is under attack by enemies."

"周囲の敵性存在を排除し
安全の確保を。"

"限界です。
$(0)を
強制回収します。"

"$(0)'s Support Partner is being attacked! Please help it!"
